content: भोक्तृ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [भुज् तृच्] {@--1@} One who enjoys or eats. {@--2@} Possessing. {@--3@} Enjoying or making use of. {@--4@} Feeling, enduring, experiencing. {@--5@} Protecting, ruling, governing. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A possessor, enjoyer, user. {@--2@} A husband. {@--3@} A king, ruler. {@--4@} A lover {@--5@} An epithet of Viṣṇu.
